2015.context: Coinbase Global, Inc. is a cryptocurrency exchange and platform focused on crypto trading, custody, staking, and blockchain infrastructure. Leading US crypto exchange. Bitcoin trading for retail users.

competitors.name: Bitstamp
competitors.notes: European Bitcoin exchange with early institutional focus

competitors.name: Kraken
competitors.notes: US cryptocurrency exchange with trading features

competitors.name: Bitfinex
competitors.notes: Major cryptocurrency exchange with advanced trading

competitors.name: Circle
competitors.notes: Consumer Bitcoin company and exchange (later pivoted to USDC)

competitors.name: itBit
competitors.notes: Regulated Bitcoin exchange (now part of Paxos)

competitors.name: Gemini
competitors.notes: Regulated US exchange founded by Winklevoss twins

competitors.name: LocalBitcoins
competitors.notes: Peer-to-peer Bitcoin marketplace

competitors.name: BTC-e
competitors.notes: Major exchange later shut down by authorities

2020.context: Coinbase Global, Inc. is a cryptocurrency exchange and platform focused on crypto trading, custody, staking, and blockchain infrastructure. Institutional crypto custody. Expanded crypto asset offerings.

competitors.name: Binance
competitors.notes: Largest global cryptocurrency exchange by volume

competitors.name: Kraken
competitors.notes: Major US exchange with margin trading and futures

competitors.name: Gemini
competitors.notes: Regulated US exchange with institutional focus

competitors.name: FTX
competitors.notes: Fast-growing exchange with derivatives focus (later collapsed)

competitors.name: Robinhood
competitors.notes: Retail trading app adding cryptocurrency trading

competitors.name: eToro
competitors.notes: Social trading platform with crypto offerings

competitors.name: Bitstamp
competitors.notes: European exchange with US presence

competitors.name: BlockFi
competitors.notes: Crypto lending platform competing for deposits

2024.context: Coinbase Global, Inc. is a cryptocurrency exchange and platform focused on crypto trading, custody, staking, and blockchain infrastructure. Base L2 blockchain. Bitcoin ETF custody provider. Regulatory battles.

competitors.name: Binance
competitors.notes: Largest global exchange, facing regulatory challenges in US

competitors.name: Kraken
competitors.notes: Major US exchange competitor with derivatives offerings

competitors.name: Robinhood
competitors.notes: Retail trading platform with growing crypto revenue

competitors.name: Crypto.com
competitors.notes: Global exchange with aggressive marketing and card products

competitors.name: OKX
competitors.notes: Major global exchange expanding internationally

competitors.name: Gemini
competitors.notes: Regulated US exchange with institutional services

competitors.name: Fidelity Digital Assets
competitors.notes: Traditional finance entering crypto custody and trading

competitors.name: BlackRock (via ETFs)
competitors.notes: Competing for crypto exposure through spot Bitcoin ETF

2025.context: Coinbase Global, Inc. is a cryptocurrency exchange and platform focused on crypto trading, custody, staking, and blockchain infrastructure. Crypto infrastructure leader. International expansion and derivatives.

competitors.name: Binance
competitors.notes: Largest global exchange by volume, rebuilding after regulatory settlements

competitors.name: Kraken
competitors.notes: Major US competitor with derivatives and institutional services

competitors.name: Robinhood
competitors.notes: Retail platform with significant crypto trading volume

competitors.name: OKX
competitors.notes: Global exchange with strong derivatives and DeFi integration

competitors.name: Crypto.com
competitors.notes: Global exchange with cards, DeFi, and sports sponsorships

competitors.name: BlackRock/Fidelity ETFs
competitors.notes: Traditional finance capturing crypto exposure through ETFs

competitors.name: Bitwise
competitors.notes: Crypto asset manager with ETF products

competitors.name: Anchorage Digital
competitors.notes: Institutional crypto bank and custody competitor
